results.name: Arnold Press
results.description:
Zwei Kurzhanteln mit den HandflÃ¤chen nach innen vor der Brust halten, Ellbogen unterhalb der Handgelenke.

Ellbogen nach auÃŸen bringen und Hanteln Ã¼ber den Kopf heben. Drehung kommt aus dem Ellbogen, nicht aus den Armen!

Wenn die Arme durchgestreckt sind, die gleiche Bewegung rÃ¼ckwÃ¤rts ausfÃ¼hren.

results.name: Axe Hold
results.description: Grab dumbbells and extend arms to side and hold as long as you can

results.name: Axe Hold
results.description: Nehmen Sie die Hanteln und strecken Sie die Arme zur Seite. Halten Sie sie so lange wie mÃ¶glich.

results.name: Back Squat
results.description: Place a barbell in a rack just below shoulder-height. Dip under the bar to put it behind the neck across the top of the back, and grip the bar with the hands wider than shoulder-width apart. Lift the chest up and squeeze the shoulder blades together to keep the straight back throughout the entire movement. Stand up to bring the bar off the rack and step backwards, then place the feet so that they are a little wider than shoulder-width apart. Sit back into hips and keep the back straight and the chest up, squatting down so the hips are below the knees. From the bottom of the squat, press feet into the ground and push hips forward to return to the top of the standing position.

Bringe die Stange nicht wie beim (breiten) BankdrÃ¼cken auf BrusthÃ¶he runter, sondern weiter unten. Auf der tiefsten Stelle sollten deine Arme einen rechten Winkel machen.

results.name: Barbell Ab Rollout
results.description:
Place a barbell on the floor at your feet.

Bending at the waist, grip the barbell with a shoulder with overhand grip.

With a slow controlled motion, roll the bar out so that your back is straight.

Roll back up raising your hips and butt as you return to the starting position.

results.name: Barbell Hack Squats
results.description: Perform leg squats with barbell behind your legs

results.name: Barbell Lunges
results.description:
Put barbell on the back of your shoulders. Stand upright, then take the first step forward. Step should bring you forward so that your supporting legs knee can touch the floor. Then stand back up and repeat with the other leg.

Remember to keep good posture.

results.name: Barbell Reverse Wrist Curl
results.description:
Sitting on a bench, grab a barbell with your palms facing down and your hands shoulder-width apart. Rest your forearms on your thighs and allow your wrists to hang over your knees.

Curl your knuckles towards your face, lifting the barbell. Pause for a moment in the top position, then slowly return the barbell to the starting position.

results.name: Barbell Triceps Extension
results.description:
Position barbell overhead with narrow overhand grip.

Lower forearm behind upper arm with elbows remaining overhead. Extend forearm overhead. Lower and repeat.
